title: Secure Health Data Access Management
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want role-based access controls for health data so that I can securely monitor my clients' health without compromising their privacy.

title: Intuitive Onboarding and Setup Process
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a step-by-step guided setup process for the ALFRED system, so that I can efficiently configure the platform for my clients without requiring extensive training or technical knowledge.

title: Customizable Dashboard Layouts
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a customizable dashboard layout that allows me to quickly access health metrics and manage multiple clients so that I can efficiently monitor their health and coordinate care without confusion.

title: Comprehensive Data Privacy Controls
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want user-defined privacy settings for data sharing so that I can ensure health data is accessed securely and respects my clients' privacy preferences.

title: Integration with External Health Software
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want ALFRED to integrate with external health software so that I can efficiently monitor clients' health metrics and maintain accurate care documentation while ensuring data privacy.

title: Knowledge Base for Caregiver Empowerment
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to a comprehensive knowledge base within ALFRED so that I can quickly find reliable information and strategies to effectively support my clients' health and well-being while ensuring their privacy and comfort.

title: Health Monitoring Alerts
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to receive validated alerts for significant changes in my clients' health metrics so that I can ensure timely intervention while maintaining clear communication and minimizing client stress.

title: Collaborative Care Coordination Features – Shared Access to Care Plans
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want secure and collaborative access to my clients' care plans so that I can effectively coordinate care with healthcare professionals and maintain clear communication with clients' family members.
